name: Jewel Match 3 Deluxe
description:
From the family of match three games, Games Clan Studio presents an other match three mania game. Jewel Match 3 Deluxe is the highly addictive casual game with unlimited interesting puzzle game levels. Jewel Match 3 Deluxe is consists of unlimited puzzle gaming levels & better than any match three game. Each level is like new puzzle to solve. You have to complete each level in limited moves. If you like challenges than this game is just for you. Jewel Match 3 Deluxe is complete package of fun and addiction for Match three kind game lovers.

FEATURES:
- Nice game music
- Awesome game graphics
- 250+ puzzle gaming levels
- Free to play
- Best match three puzzle game

Share this game with friends & compete them with your highscore...

For more suggestion/feedback feel free to contact us at gamesclanstudio@gmail.com
